languages.text: Новатор Кассия, собрав все силы Дома, отправилась к дальним звездам. Никто из навигаторов не ослушался призыва на битву, ведь воля их была подавлена Кассией через Атлас Звездных Путей. Новатор нанесла удар возмездия таинственным убийцам — ксеносам в пестрых одеяниях. Во время триумфального чествования победоносного похода произошло непоправимое — Новатор утратила разум. В приступе безумия она уничтожила Атлас Звездных Путей и сгинула в жуткой манифестации Имматериума. Большинство ее подданных погибло в тот же день, связанные духовными узами со своим Атласом. Имя Орселлио пало в объятья забвения.

Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.
languages.original_text: Новатор Кассия, собрав все силы Дома, отправилась к дальним звездам. В приступе безумия она уничтожила Атлас Звездных Путей и сгинула в жуткой манифестации Имматериума. Большинство ее подданных погибло в тот же день, связанные духовными узами со своим Атласом. traits.locale_text: Novator Cassia gathered all her House's might and travelled to distant stars. Not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle, as their will was repressed through the Starway Atlas by Cassia. The Novator launched a retaliation strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. During the triumphal celebration of the victorious campaign, something disastrous happened — the Novator lost her sanity. In a stroke of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous Immaterium manifestation. Most of her subjects died the same day, connected by spiritual bonds with their Atlas. The name of Orsellio fell into the embrace of oblivion.

languages.text: 卡西娅大族长聚集了家族的全部力量，前往遥远的群星之中。受制于卡西娅的群星圣仪的影响，没有任何导航者能违逆这场战斗的召唤。卡西娅向那群神秘的刺客——一群穿着杂色服装的异形发起了报复性打击。然而，在凯旋的庆祝典礼上，灾难降临了。卡西娅突然失去了理智，她发起了一连串疯狂的攻击，摧毁了群星圣仪，之后在亚空间恐怖的力量之中消失得无影无踪。由于她的臣民与圣仪之间有着精神纽带，当圣仪被摧毁时，绝大部分族人也一同丧命。在此之后，奥赛罗家族的名字也被人遗忘。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.

traits.locale_text: 卡西娅大族长聚集了家族的全部力量，前往遥远的群星之中。受制于卡西娅的群星圣仪的影响，没有任何导航者能违逆这场战斗的召唤。卡西娅向那群神秘的刺客——一群穿着杂色服装的异形发起了报复性打击。然而，在凯旋的庆祝典礼上，灾难降临了。卡西娅突然失去了理智，她发起了一连串疯狂的攻击，摧毁了群星圣仪，之后在亚空间恐怖的力量之中消失得无影无踪。由于她的臣民与圣仪之间有着精神纽带，当圣仪被摧毁时，绝大部分族人也一同丧命。在此之后，奥塞罗家族的名字也被人遗忘。

languages.text: Novatorin Cassia versammelte die gesamte Macht ihres Hauses und reiste zu fernen Sternen. Von Cassias Atlas der Sternenwege gefesselt konnte kein einziger Navigator den Ruf in die Schlacht ignorieren. Die Novatorin führte einen Vergeltungsschlag gegen mysteriöse Attentäter aus — Xenos in bunter Kleidung. Während der triumphalen Siegesfeier kam es zu einer Katastrophe — die Novatorin verlor den Verstand. In einem Anfall von Wahnsinn zerstörte sie den Atlas der Sternenwege und verschwand in einer grässlichen Manifestation des Immateriums. Der Großteil ihrer Untertanen starb noch am selben Tag, da sie durch spirituelle Bande mit dem Atlas verbunden gewesen waren. Der Name Orsellio fiel gemeinsam mit ihnen der Vergessenheit anheim.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.

traits.locale_text: Novatorin Cassia versammelte die gesamte Macht ihres Hauses und reiste zu fernen Sternen. Von Cassias Atlas der Sternenwege gefesselt konnte kein einziger Navigator den Ruf in die Schlacht ignorieren. Die Novatorin führte einen Vergeltungsschlag gegen mysteriöse Attentäter aus — Xenos in bunter Kleidung. Während der triumphalen Siegesfeier kam es zu einer Katastrophe — die Novatorin verlor den Verstand. In einem Anfall von Wahnsinn zerstörte sie den Atlas der Sternenwege und verschwand in einer grässlichen Manifestation des Immateriums. Der Großteil ihrer Untertanen starb noch am selben Tag, da sie durch spirituelle Bande mit dem Atlas verbunden gewesen waren. Der Name Orsellio fiel gemeinsam mit ihnen der Vergessenheit anheim.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia rassembla toute la puissance de sa maison et voyagea vers des étoiles lointaines. Incapables de se soustraire à la puissance de son Atlas des étoiles, les navigateurs ne pouvaient ignorer les appels aux combats qu'elle lançait. Cassia effectua une frappe de représailles à l'encontre d'assassins mystérieux, des xénos vêtus de tenues bigarrées, mais le désastre frappa durant la célébration triomphale de cette campagne victorieuse : la Novator perdit l'esprit. Dans un accès de folie, elle détruisit l'Atlas des étoiles et disparut dans une horrible manifestation de l'Immaterium. La plupart de ses sujets, qui étaient liés spirituellement à l'Atlas, moururent ce jour-là. C'est ainsi que le nom des Orsellio tomba dans l'oubli.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.

traits.locale_text: La Novator Cassia rassembla toute la puissance de sa maison et voyagea vers des étoiles lointaines. Incapables de se soustraire à la puissance de son Atlas des étoiles, les navigateurs ne pouvaient ignorer les appels aux combats qu’elle lançait. Cassia effectua une frappe de représailles à l'encontre d'assassins mystérieux, des xénos vêtus de tenues bigarrées, mais le désastre frappa durant la célébration triomphale de cette campagne victorieuse : la Novator perdit l'esprit. Dans un accès de folie, elle détruisit l'Atlas des étoiles et disparut dans une horrible manifestation de l'Immaterium. La plupart de ses sujets, qui étaient liés spirituellement à l’Atlas, moururent ce jour-là. C'est ainsi que le nom des Orsellio tomba dans l'oubli.

languages.text: La Novator Cassia reunió todas las fuerzas de su casa para viajar a estrellas lejanas. Atrapados por el Atlas de las Vías Estelares de Cassia, ningún Navegante pudo ignorar su llamada a la batalla. La Novator lanzó un ataque en venganza contra unos asesinos misteriosos: xenos vestidos con ropajes moteados. El desastre sobrevino durante la celebración del triunfo de la campaña, cuando la Novator enloqueció. En un arranque de demencia, destruyó el Atlas y desapareció como una espantosa manifestación del Inmaterio. La mayoría de sus súbditos murieron ese mismo día, a través de su conexión espiritual al Atlas. La familia Orsellio cayó en el olvido junto a ellos.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.

La Novator lanzó un ataque en venganza contra unos asesinos misteriosos: xenos vestidos con ropajes moteados. El desastre sobrevino durante la celebración del triunfo de la campaña, cuando la Novator enloqueció. En un arranque de demencia, destruyó el Atlas y desapareció como una espantosa manifestación del Inmaterio. La mayoría de sus súbditos murieron ese mismo día, a través de su conexión espiritual al Atlas. La familia Orsellio cayó en el olvido junto a ellos.

languages.text: ノベイターのカシアは一族の力を結集し、遠い星々へと旅立った。カシアのスターウェイ・アトラスに惑わされた航宙士は、一人として戦いの呼びかけを無視できなかった。ノベイターは謎の暗殺者たち…雑多な衣装をまとった異種族への報復攻撃を開始した。勝利の凱旋作戦中に災難が襲った。狂気に襲われた彼女はスターウェイ・アトラスを破壊し、非物質世界の醜悪な姿になり、失踪した。アトラスと精神的な絆で結ばれていた彼女の臣下の多くがその日のうちに死んだ。オーセリオの名は、彼女らとともに忘却の彼方へと消えていった。
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.

traits.locale_text: ノベイターのカシアは一族の力を結集し、遠い星々へと旅立った。カシアのスターウェイ・アトラスに惑わされた航宙士は、一人として戦いの呼びかけを無視できなかった。ノベイターは謎の暗殺者たち…雑多な衣装をまとった異種族への報復攻撃を開始した。勝利の凱旋作戦中に災難が襲った。狂気に襲われた彼女はスターウェイ・アトラスを破壊し、非物質世界の醜悪な姿になり、失踪した。アトラスと精神的な絆で結ばれていた彼女の臣下の多くがその日のうちに死んだ。オーセリオの名は、彼女らとともに忘却の彼方へと消えていった。

languages.text: Rota Reisi Cassia, Hanesinin tüm gücünü toplayıp uzak yıldızlara doğru yola koyuldu. Cassia'nın Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın kapanında oldukları için hiçbir Rotacı, bu muharebe çağrısına uymamazlık edemedi. Rota Reisi; gizemli suikastçılara, rengârenk kıyafetler giyen zenolara misilleme saldırısında bulundu. Seferin büyük başarısı kutlanırken bir felaket meydana geldi: Rota Reisi aklını yitirdi. Bir an delirip Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nı yok etti ve Tindiyar'ın kerih tecellilerinden birinde ortadan kayboldu. Çoğu tebaası, Atlas'la ruhani bağı olduğundan o gün öldü. Orsellio ismi de onlarla beraber hiçliğe karıştı.
languages.original_text: Novator Cassia mustered all the might of her House and set off for distant stars. Ensnared by Cassia's Starway Atlas, not a single Navigator could ignore the call to battle. The Novator launched a retaliatory strike on mysterious assassins — xenos in motley garb. Disaster struck during the victorious campaign's triumphal celebration — the Novator lost her mind. In a fit of madness, she destroyed the Starway Atlas and disappeared in a hideous manifestation of the Immaterium. Most of her subjects died that very day, connected to the Atlas by their spiritual bonds. The Orsellio name fell into oblivion along with them.

traits.locale_text: Rota Reisi Cassia, Hane'sinin tüm gücünü topladı ve uzak yıldızlara doğru yola çıktı. Cassia'nın Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nın kapanında oldukları için hiçbir Rotacı, bu muharebe çağrısına uymamazlık edemedi. Rota Reisi gizemli suikastçılara, rengârenk kıyafetler giyen zenolara misilleme saldırısında bulundu. Seferin büyük başarısı kutlanırken bir felaket meydana geldi: Rota Reisi aklını yitirdi. Bir delilik krizi içinde Yıldız Yolu Atlası'nı yok etti ve Tindiyar'ın kerih tecellilerinin birinde ortadan kayboldu. Tebaalarının çoğu, Atlas'la ruhani bir bağa sahip oldukları için o gün öldüler. Orsellio ismi de onlarla beraber hiçliğe karıştı.
